item.description:
Apropos of arbitrary milestones, this event will be the 300th program the Boston Atheists organization has sponsored through its activities on Meetup.com. Perhaps we should get a cake with candles! TELL YOU WHAT: If more than 25 people RSVP, there WILL be cake.*

Join us for our usual casual brunch affair, where the conversation ranges widely in a superstition-free atmosphere. Whet your appetite with a peek at the menu: http://taverninthesquare.com/tavallston/content/brunch.

As we often do with our brunches, we've selected a charity to support with voluntary giving. Any member who wishes to donate a few dollars to the pot will, this time around, be supporting Action for Boston Community Development Inc., which for fifty years has  "provided basic services and innovative programs that help empower individuals, families, and communities in Boston to overcome poverty, live with dignity, and achieve their full potential." Learn more about their good works at http://www.bostonabcd.org/services.aspx. Even if you don't plan to attend the brunch, you're welcome to chip in to the donation via PayPal (or other arrangements... contact me to make a cash or check contribution). All proceeds go directly to ABCD.

If you are aware of a local cause that you'd like to see supported by an upcoming Blasphemy Brunch, let us know!

 

* The cake is not a lie.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the "Boston Atheists" at the host/hostess station
item.name: Our 300th Scheduled Event! January Blasphemy Brunch
